scripts.dev: concurrently -c blue,green -n api,front "npm run dev -w apps/api" "npm run dev -w apps/front"
scripts.build: concurrently -c blue,green -n api,front "npm run build -w apps/api" "npm run build -w apps/front"
scripts.start: concurrently -c blue,green -n api,front "npm run start:build -w apps/api" "npm run start -w apps/front"
